content: drops crocheted scarf in ull-bouclé and hat in tynn chenille hat sizes head measurement = approx 56 cm \ 22 materials garnstudio tynn chenille 90% cotton 10% polyester 50 g/120 m /130 yards 50 g col no 924 deep red 50 g col no 925 burgundy drops 2 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 24 single_crochet = 10 cm \ 4 wide 1 crocheted square = approx 7 x 7 cm \ 2 75 hat requires 8 squares sewn into a strip and seamed to create a ring top is crocheted in the round items in the set scarf 1 hat 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/67-24-crocheted-scarf
